description:
A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides programmatic access to the entire
  GoHighLevel platform API with 269+ automated tools.

  What it does

  This MCP server acts as a bridge between AI assistants (like Claude) and GoHighLevel's extensive API
  ecosystem, enabling:

  - Complete CRM automation - Manage contacts, companies, opportunities, pipelines
  - Marketing automation - Create/manage campaigns, workflows, funnels, forms
  - Communication tools - SMS, email, voicemail drops, conversations
  - Calendar & booking - Appointments, availability, scheduling
  - Course & membership management - Products, offers, price points
  - Analytics & reporting - Track performance, attribution, conversions
  - Agency management - Sub-accounts, users, permissions, SaaS rebilling
  - Integration capabilities - Webhooks, custom fields, OAuth apps

  Key Features

  - 269+ pre-built tools covering every GoHighLevel API endpoint
  - Automatic token refresh for uninterrupted access
  - Smart pagination handling for large datasets
  - Error handling & retry logic for reliability
  - Type-safe operations with full TypeScript support
  - Modular architecture organized by functional domains

  Use Cases

  - Build custom automations and workflows
  - Bulk data operations and migrations
  - Create custom reporting dashboards
  - Integrate GoHighLevel with other platforms
  - Automate repetitive administrative tasks
  - Develop custom applications on top of GoHighLevel

  Perfect for agencies, developers, and power users who want to unlock the full potential of GoHighLevel through
   code and AI-powered automation.

capabilities.description: Create a new association that defines relationship types between entities like contacts, custom objects, and opportunities.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_association_by_id
capabilities.description: Get a specific association by its ID. Works for both system-defined and user-defined associations.

capabilities.name: ghl_update_association
capabilities.description: Update the labels of an existing association. Only user-defined associations can be updated.

capabilities.name: ghl_delete_association
capabilities.description: Delete a user-defined association. This will also delete all relations created with this association.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_association_by_key
capabilities.description: Get an association by its key name. Useful for finding both standard and user-defined associations.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_association_by_object_key
capabilities.description: Get associations by object keys like contacts, custom objects, and opportunities.

capabilities.name: ghl_create_relation
capabilities.description: Create a relation between two entities using an existing association. Links specific records together.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_relations_by_record
capabilities.description: Get all relations for a specific record ID with pagination and optional filtering by association IDs.

capabilities.name: ghl_delete_relation
capabilities.description: Delete a specific relation between two entities.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_custom_field_by_id
capabilities.description: Get a custom field or folder by its ID. Supports custom objects and company (business) fields.

capabilities.name: ghl_create_custom_field
capabilities.description: Create a new custom field for custom objects or company (business). Supports various field types including text, number, options, date, file upload, etc.

capabilities.name: ghl_update_custom_field
capabilities.description: Update an existing custom field by ID. Can modify name, description, options, and other properties.

capabilities.name: ghl_delete_custom_field
capabilities.description: Delete a custom field by ID. This will permanently remove the field and its data.

capabilities.name: ghl_get_custom_fields_by_object_key
capabilities.description: Get all custom fields and folders for a specific object key (e.g., custom object or company).

capabilities.name: ghl_create_custom_field_folder
capabilities.description: Create a new custom field folder for organizing fields within an object.

capabilities.name: ghl_update_custom_field_folder
capabilities.description: Update the name of an existing custom field folder.

capabilities.name: ghl_delete_custom_field_folder
capabilities.description: Delete a custom field folder. This will also affect any fields within the folder.
